meanings.definition: The quality of being bold or adventurous.
meanings.sent1: Her daringness in trying new things inspired her friends to be more adventurous.
meanings.sent2: His daringness in exploring unknown territories led to many exciting discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The daringness of wearing mismatched socks to a formal event made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The daringness of a lone flower blooming in the desert symbolized hope and courage.
meanings.sent5: The daringness of the acrobat's high-flying act left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of taking risks or being courageous.
meanings.sent1: The daringness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: She showed great daringness when she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The daringness of trying to juggle while riding a unicycle was both impressive and hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His daringness in speaking up against injustice made him a hero in the community.
meanings.sent5: The daringness of the mountain climber facing the treacherous peak was truly admirable.
